title: LEGO Harry Potter Hogwart's Express (4841)
features: Includes 5 minifigures: Harry Potter, Ron Weasley, Ginny Weasley, Luna Lovegood and Draco Malfoy
Hogwarts Express accessories include food trolley, suitcases, ice cream, owls, Invisibility Cloak and more
Remove passenger car roof to reveal inside
birthday, Cyber Monday, Black Friday, Thanksgiving, easter, halloween, hannukkah, christmas,
description: Fly over the Hogwarts Express with Harry and Ron! Ron and Harry borrow Mr. Weasley’s flying blue car and catch up with the Hogwarts Express, but something goes wrong. Harry’s door opens and he is left hanging on as Ron steers the car overhead. Open the top of the passenger train to reveal Luna, Ginny and Draco and interior details!
